actor-start.eventDescription: Initial fee for starting the MCP Server Actor

search-papers.eventDescription: Fee for searching papers on arXiv using the search_papers tool.

list-papers.eventDescription: Fee for listing available papers using the list_papers tool.

download-paper.eventDescription: Fee for downloading a paper from arXiv using the download_paper tool.

read-paper.eventDescription: Fee for reading the full content of a paper using the read_paper tool.
